subject: Cannot login to account
description: I have been locked out of my account after 3 failed login attempts. The password reset link is not working either.

subject: App crashes on startup
description: The application crashes immediately upon launch. Error indicates memory allocation failure.

subject: Billing inquiry duplicate charge
description: I was charged twice this month. Two identical charges on same day. Please refund the duplicate.

subject: Feature request dark mode
description: Would be nice to have dark mode option. Many users requesting this feature.

subject: Production system completely down
description: CRITICAL: Production server offline. All customers unable to access service. Immediate action needed.

subject: 2FA setup failing repeatedly
description: Cannot enable two-factor authentication. Setup fails at step 2 every time I try.

subject: Credit card payment declined
description: Payment was declined but no error message provided. What is the issue?

subject: CSV export produces corrupted files
description: The CSV export feature creates files that cannot be opened. Recurring issue affecting business operations.

subject: Enhancement bulk user management
description: Could you add bulk user management? Currently very time-consuming to manage users.

subject: Account locked security breach
description: My account has been locked due to suspected unauthorized access. How can I regain access?

subject: API documentation incorrect
description: The API reference documentation is outdated and does not match actual endpoints.

subject: Request refund for subscription
description: I want to request a full refund for my last subscription payment. Service not as expected.

subject: Severe performance degradation
description: Application is extremely slow when loading large datasets. Takes 5+ minutes for basic operations.

subject: Password reset email not received
description: I clicked reset password but never received the email confirmation link.

subject: Feature scheduling appointment
description: Could you add appointment scheduling to the calendar module?

subject: SECURITY: Potential SQL injection vulnerability
description: We found a potential SQL injection vulnerability in the user search endpoint. Immediate patch needed.

subject: Invoice charge discrepancy
description: Invoice shows different charges than quoted. Please clarify the billing.

subject: iOS app crashes between tabs
description: The iOS app keeps crashing when switching between tabs. Very frustrating experience.

subject: Feature integration Salesforce CRM
description: Can you integrate with Salesforce CRM? Many enterprise customers would benefit.

subject: Account access successfully restored
description: Thank you for restoring my account access quickly. Everything is working perfectly now.
